trans-unit.source: Allows text engine clients to map a text source character index to the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o texto clientes motor mapear um índice de caráter de origem do texto para correspondente <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IndexedGlyphRun object allows a text engine client to obtain glyph information for a text source character such as the glyph's cluster map, glyph indices, and glyph typeface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de IndexedGlyphRun permite que um cliente de motor de texto obter informações de glifo para um caráter de origem de texto, tal como o mapa de cluster de glifo, índices glyph e tipo de carácter do glifo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref> que corresponde ao <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text source character index that corresponds to the beginning of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de caráter de origem de texto que corresponde ao início do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the text source character index.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que representa o índice de caráter de origem do texto.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text source character length that corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento de caráter de origem de texto que corresponde do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The value of the TextSourceLength property is not necessarily equal to the character count of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade TextSourceLength não é necessariamente igual à contagem de caráter de <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> correspondente

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the length of the text source character.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que representa o comprimento do caráter de origem de texto.</xref:System.Int32>
